item.title: アンドロイド版グーグル・クロームの「ディスカバー」フィードがロシア人視聴者に誤解を招くプロパガンダを提供する仕組み、ロシア語サービスの優先度は低いと関係者（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
How Google Chrome's Discover feed on Android serves up misleading propaganda to Russian audiences; a source says Russian-languages services are a lower priority  —  Mobile users in Russia are being served pro-war propaganda from sources Google has blocked elsewhere.

The UK CMA launches an investigation into whether the BBC, ITV, Hat Trick, Tiger Aspect, and others broke competition law when buying services from freelancers  —  Britain's antitrust regulator said it suspected that television production companies including the BBC, ITV (ITV.L) …

item.title: AutomatticがActivityPubのサポートをWordPress.comのホスティングサイトに拡大、ブログオーナーはMastodonの180万MAUを含む13.3Mのフェディバースのユーザーにリーチできる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）

Automattic expands ActivityPub support to WordPress.com hosted sites, letting blog owners reach 13.3M users across the fediverse, including Mastodon's 1.8M MAUs  —  Earlier this year, WordPress.com owner Automattic acquired a plugin that allowed WordPress blogs to be followed in the fediverse …

item.title: モンタナ大学ジャーナリズム学部にある非営利ニュースサービスICTの3人による山岳支局で、この地域の先住民を取材している様子（Katie Fairbanks/Montana Free Press）
item.description:
Katie Fairbanks / Montana Free Press:
A look at nonprofit news service ICT's three-person mountain bureau at the University of Montana School of Journalism, covering Indigenous peoples in the region  —  About a year and a half ago when the nonprofit Native news service ICT was considering locations for a new regional bureau, Montana rose to the top.

item.title: ストリーミングサービスとスタジオの優先順位の違いなど、WGAのストライキを長引かせた要因について考察し、対話が後の再度の対立を防ぐかもしれない（Cynthia Littleton/Variety）
item.description:

A look at factors that prolonged the WGA strike, like different priorities for streaming services and studios, and how dialog may prevent another standoff later  —  Why did it take five months?  —  That's the vexing question that entertainment industry insiders are wrestling with even as they cheer …

item.title: パイパー・サンドラーが米国の10代の若者9,000人以上を対象に行った調査：1日の動画消費時間の29.1％がYouTubeで、Netflixの28.7％を初めて上回った。
item.description:
Kif Leswing / CNBC:
Piper Sandler survey of 9,000+ US teens: 29.1% of their daily video consumption time is on YouTube, beating Netflix for the first time at 28.7%, and ~7% on Hulu  —  - Teenagers in the United States say they watch more video on YouTube than Netflix, according to a new survey from investment bank Piper Sandler.

item.title: 内部メモ：NPRは、Twitterが「米国家系メディア」とレッテルを貼った後、Twitterを離れてからの半年間で、ごくわずかなトラフィックを失った（Gabe Bullard/Nieman Reports）。
item.description:
Gabe Bullard / Nieman Reports:
Internal memo: NPR lost a negligible amount of traffic in the six months since leaving Twitter, after the service labeled the outlet “US state-affiliated media”  —  The numbers confirm what many of us have long suspected — that Twitter wasn't worth the effort, at least in terms of traffic

item.title: 情報源：レイオフに関する険悪なスタッフ・ミーティングで、ワシントン・ポスト紙のパティ・ストーンズィーファー暫定CEOは、「これは本当に良いビジネスだが、経費を使いすぎた」と述べた（Corbin Bolies/The Daily Beast）。

Sources: in a testy staff meeting about layoffs, interim Washington Post CEO Patty Stonesifer said “this is a really good business that we overshot on expenses”  —  A meeting between Washington Post leadership and staff grew contentious over its buyout program.
